column1: Kata Robata////Looked up the Sushi Club of Houston's recommendations while on a business trip and Kata Robata was listed #1. They factor many things into this rating
column5: and quality of fish. I've been to many of the top choices
column7: and I will say when you take all those factors into account
column13: it's worth it. Great Sake list. Happy Â hour menu
column15: if you're looking to try a few great things but not break the bank. Will return.
